text: Share Tweet Email Copy Link Copied For those reeling from a rocky relationship, here ’ s some advice you can take at face value : get a nose job. That ’ s exactly what 28 - year - old reality TV personality, Naomie Olindo, decided to do less than half a year after breaking up with heartthrob, Craig Conover. On Thursday, the star of Southern Charm revealed the results of her makeover on Instagram, complete with a nose emoji to further press the point. Admitting that a bit of swelling was still present in the wake of the procedure less than two weeks earlier, Olindo claimed during an interview on Bravo TV that she decided to take advantage of the show ’ s post - season hiatus to undergo the procedure.
